item.title: On Deepawali and the change of theme
item.description: This is today that somebody pointed out: “Your blog is not looking that fine”. And I realize why I lost interest in writing on this blog. Following the suggestion I have changed the blog’s theme again. Tell me, if this one feels fine enough. Today is Deepawali, the so-called biggest festival of India. Everybody out there is celebrating, burning crackers, or making merry; and here I am writing on my blog after a long break (my biggest break ever), amid the sounds of ladis, bombs, rockets, whistlers.
